Instruction: Bake in the preheated oven until the tortillas are golden brown and crisp, about 10 to 15 minutes.
Sprinkle in taco seasoning and mix well.

Bake the tortilla in the preheated oven until it is crispy and golden brown, for about 5 to 7 minutes. Allow it to cool slightly for about 2 minutes before transferring it from the mold to a serving dish.
Remove the egg mixture from the microwave and use a fork to gently stir. Microwave again until fully cooked, about 30 seconds more.
Place the cooked eggs into the tortilla bowl and garnish with avocado, salsa, paprika, and salt.
You can replace butter with margarine, if you prefer.
You can use any type of milk for this recipe.
